segments.text: Oh , Mike . How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not bad . It seems you are super yogurt lover . You have so many in your cart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I prefer yogurt to all the other drinks . Have you ever tried a kind of yogurt with old milk in it ? It tastes great and very healthy too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I haven ’ t noticed that before . Maybe I will try next time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don ’ t you go ahead of me ? I have more items than you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . In fact , I am in a hurry . My wife is waiting for me at the parking lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . It was good seeing you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . Have a great day .
segments.speaker: S1
